description:
Digital business cards have arrived! With over 75,000 downloads and a top 20 app around the world, CardFlick is the business card you always have with you.

FEATURES
• Create a card in one tap.
• Share your card with anyone, even if they don't have the app!
• Over 20 gorgeous themes by some of the top designers in the world.
• Flicking is the new black. Geolocated contact sharing.
• Dead simple privacy controls.
• Cloud Synced Contacts, never lose a number again.
• Custom designed cards with CardFlick Pro, http://cardflick.co/pro

REVIEWS

• LIFEHACKER
“Sending is very easy if you encounter someone else using the CardFlick app…”

• TUAW - App of the Day
“Cardflick is a snap to set up, good looking, and easy to use. Oh, and did I mention it’s free?”

• MASHABLE
"The application offers by far the simplest and most elegant card creation experience on the market, and it provides you with top-notch card design themes."

• THE NEXT WEB
“What makes CardFlick unique is that digital cards are not only useful for storing and transmitting people’s information, they’re downright gorgeous.”

• PC WORLD
“The idea of “flicking” cards over to other users is fun, and you can always email the card as a backup”

• TECHCRUNCH
“Winner - TechCrunch Disrupt Audience Choice”

CUSTOMER SUPPORT
We love feedback on twitter - https://twitter.com/#!/CardFlick
We answer all tweets as soon as possible! Sometimes within seconds, other times we are probably napping.
releaseNotes:
CardFlick 1.7 – Put a design studio in your pocket
========
Users have been loving our Instacards and asking when they can start customizing on their phones. We heard them, and with CardFlick 1.7 we want to show you the best business card designer around – you.

Grab any theme from our expanded collection – remix it and make it your own
Pull in your Facebook and Instagram photos to make your card sing
Upload that special image just for your card
Pick a color, any color, for your text
Set your accents to make it pop

Now you’re ready to share your hot new card with anyone – whether or not they have the app!

--------

Bug Fixes
